info.p: Pickle is a Python-specific serialization format. It allows you to convert Python objects (like lists, dictionaries, classes, etc.) into a byte stream, which can then be stored in a file or transmitted over a network.In the context of Machine Learning (ML), Pickle files are commonly used for serializing and storing trained models and intermediate data.
Visit: python documentation for an introduction and the summary of model persistence methods on different ways to persist python models.
